description: Details submitted pursuant to reference 24/02403/LBC: scaled drawings (3) in respect of alterations to part of front boundary wall, with replacement of existing timber and metal fence with iron railings, replacement of gate with arch, garden landscaping work, involving new storage unit for bins and meter, sitting area, timber screens, paving, bicycle storage and wildflower garden area.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
